title: First Blog Post
text:
Hi, My name is Alexus Lawrence and this is my first blog post. I enjoy singing , spending time with my friends and writing poems when I have the free time . At this time in my life I am pretty sad but if I can make a personal blog and write journal entries about my life , it would help. I am going to do everything to learn coding so I can do just that !
Chao!

text:

title: Second Blog Post
text:
Tips for making a new post

Copy the folder from your most recent post, then rename the folder relating to the specific post.
After, open the folder and you should see a qmd file, open it and start typing
Render
Then Publish and Push to Git

Secret tip: I got the words to be seperate by using a (-) key and putting a space between each line
How to install packages? To install packages use the install.packages (““) function , you want to make sure that the package you want to install is in quotation marks so that it completes properly. Secret tip: When you want to launch the packages you could use the library () function but it has to be completely installed. Otherwise use the ?:: function (written in your physical notebook )
There are different types of objects as well that may cause you (me lol ) to have problems in the future , so let me help you out.
There are three objects that I know of at this point in the course and they’re : names,age and date

For names , make sure to put the name in quotation marks
For objects such as age , do not put in quotation because it will read it as text rather than number

I will type more tips in as I learn
Until we meet again !
-For dates use the arrow and sys.date function. For example, for a holiday such as thanksgiving you can put thanksgiving–sys.date

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
